longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and/or passport replacing document must be valid
  on arrival.
Passport Exemptions:
- Holders of emergency or temporary passports.

Visa required, except for A max
vaccination:
Vaccination against yellow fever required if arriving within 6
days after leaving or transiting countries with risk of yellow
fever transmission For details, click here.

Exempt from Yellow Fever vaccination:
- Children under 1 year of age.
- Passengers transiting countries with risk of yellow fever
  transmission provided not leaving the transit areas.
Recommended:
- Vaccination against yellow fever for all passengers over 9
  months of age, except if visiting the city of Asuncion only.
  Malaria prophylaxis: malaria risk, almost exclusively due to
  P. vivax, is moderate in certain municipalities of the
  departments of Alto Parana and Caaguazu. In other
  departments there is no or negligible transmission risk.
  Recommended prevention: A.
shortInfo: Возможно получение визы по прибытию в международном аэропорту города Асунсьон. Выдаётся сразу многократная виза на 90 дней стоимостью $160. На наземных КПП такую визу пока не оформляют[197]. Предположительно с конца 2013 г. будет введён безвизовый режим поездок на срок до 90 дней в течение каждого периода в 180 дней.
